descript.abstract: Transport Routes, 1996 is a polyline theme representing the world's major roads and railroads.
descript.purpose: For educational, non-commercial purposes. This dataset is appropriate for use in a GIS.
descript.supplinf: The transport route maps show the world's major roads and railroads. Many of these are main polyways of international importance. They represent the framework of the world's transportation infrastructure, which provides connections between one settlement and another and between settlements and their hinterlands. Although the map scales are rather small for displaying transportation routes, the maps show the features and types of route network configurations as well as possible.

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.1850

procstep.procdesc:
The cartographic sources of the transport network data were geographical maps at scales of 1:700,000 to 1:12,000,000, sheets of an international world map at 1:2,500,000 scale, and transport maps.
Only transport ways in classes I and II of international and special national significance with the highest passing capacity and traffic intensity are shown. The railroads of all the continents are classified by significance into most important and important; by gauge into wide, standard (1,435 mm), "Cape" (1,067 mm), and narrow (914 mm). Roads are classified by significance into highways and other important roads. The exception is Europe, where only international and national roads of the highest class are shown because of the dense road network and highly-developed transport system. Transport junctions were chosen and classified by calculation of crossing transport ways.
References:
Afrika: Politicheskaya karta (Africa: Political map), 1:7,500,000. 1983. GUGK, Moscow. 2 s.
Annual bulletin of Transport Statistics for Europe. 1992. New York. 218 pp.
Australia: Tourist Map, 1:5,000,000. 1989. Tropical Publication Pty. Ltd., Cairns. 1 s.
Avtodorozhnaya karta Evropy (Road map of Europe), 1:3,500,000. 1991. VKF LenVO, St. Petersburg. 1 s.
Azia: Politicheskaya karta (Asia: Political map), 1:12,500,000. 1989. GUGK, Moscow. 1 s.
Erdol Weltatlas. 1966. Mayer F. Georg Westermann Verlag, Brannschweig. 152 s.
Geograficheskiy atlas dlya uchiteley sredney shkoly (Geographical atlas for middle school teachers). 1985. GUGK, Moscow. 238 pp.
Karta mira (Map of the world), 1:2,500,000. 1967-1976. GUGK, Moscow. Multiple sheets.
Railway Directory and Year Book 1988. 1988. A Railway Gazette international publication, London. 348 pp.
Severnaya Amerika: Politicheskaya karta (North America: Political map), 1:10,000,000. 1991. GUGK, Moscow. 1 s.
South America: An International Travel Map, 1:4,000,000. 1986- 1989. Vancouver. 4 maps.
Today's World: A new world atlas from the cartographers of Rand McNally. 1992. Rand McNally, Chicago, New York, San Francisco. 192 pp.
Transportnaya set' SSSR -- dlya vysshykh uchebnykh zavedeniy (Transport network of the USSR -- for high schools), 1:4,000,000. 1989. GUGK, Moscow. 4 s.
Yuzhnaya Amerika: Politicheskaya karta (South America: Political map), 1:10,000,000. 1986. GUGK, Moscow. 1 s.
Datasets for each continent were converted from ESRI coverage to the ESRI shapefile format using the 'copy features' tool and merged into one layer using the 'merge' tool.
